listing.listing_description:
Ski-in/ski-out access gets you onto the slopes immediately from this ultra-luxe mountain home, aloft in the snowy peaks of renowned ski-resort Deer Valley Resort. Mountain Glade rests within the exclusive gated community of Deer Crest and enjoys panoramic views of the glittering Jordanelle Reservoir.

Nine thousand square feet of luxurious living space offers plenty of room for large groups and extended or multiple families to have a ball! Step over the threshold of this magnificent alpine haven and you’ll see why. Acres of natural wood have been put to good effect in making this ski home warm and friendly. Deep-cushioned sofas and leather armchairs invite you to take a seat in the glow of the towering stone fireplace and admire the awe-inspiring views through cathedral-like windows. The vista extends into the neighboring dining room and gourmet marble-topped kitchen with its handy breakfast bar and its chef-ready stainless steel range.

Honeyed wood floors, vaulted ceilings and timber clad walls are bathed in natural light from the huge windows while potted plants, comfortable furniture and soft rugs lend a welcoming homely feel to Mountain Glade. The house’s many fireplaces offer cozy resting places after a day on the slopes and there is plenty of entertainment on offer at the family room’s pool table and in the impressive home theater with its stadium seating and beanbags. If you really must work there’s a study with desk and computer, or you can pull a book from the shelf and settle into a fireside leather recliner. Stargazing from the outdoor hot tub is the perfect way to end the day.

Six ultra-comfortable spacious bedrooms can easily accommodate up to 17 people and the rustic wood twin bunks are a novelty for kids. Soak away any cares in one of the deluxe en-suite’s deep tubs and settle into bed to dream of your next day’s ski adventures.

You can ski directly onto the slopes from Mountain Glade or travel to Main Street Park City which is 10 minutes away. In town you’ll find restaurants and grocery stores as well as golf and tennis courts. The airport is a 44 mile drive.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Get close to the action at Utah’s top ski-town with this central, convenient and highly sought-after apartment. This fully-outfitted modern property offers sporty flair and lots of cosy extras, like the glowing fireplace and rooftop terrace. The grand living room offers a great view of downtown Park City, being just seconds from the slopes and the city’s buzzing bar, brewpub and restaurant scene.

Enter Azure Vista via one of Park City’s vibrant central streets, which is decked out in ski regalia and sporting imagery. Guests can congregate in the comfortably outfitted central living area, with the city views and entertainment system providing plenty of stimulation, all within steps of the lengthy dining table and fully-equipped kitchen. After a hearty breakfast, guests can take in the bracing mountain air with a coffee or juice on the rooftop terrace, which provides a fine view of the slopes and hills that surround this charming mountain town. Guests can chase away the chills with a dip in the rooftop tub, or by luxuriating in front of the gas-fed fireplace, which bathes the apartment’s central room in a golden glow.

With downtown as your local neighborhood, guests can truly get the best out of their stay in the Wasatch Back. A short walk is all it takes to access the 17 slopes of the dynamic Park City ski resort, while the similarly impressive Deer Valley resort is just a few minutes by car. Guests also have fantastic access to the historic district of downtown and can stroll and explore at will when annual events such as the Sundance Film Festival come to down. Despite being situated in the natural splendor of the Rocky Mountains, guests can make outings to the metropolis that is Salt Lake City in approximately 30 minutes, while drives across the landscape to the Provo River and the majestic national forest beyond is always an option for the adventurous at heart.   

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This listing represents two identical and adjacent homes. Please talk to a Villa Specialist about availability for either home.

The City of Palm Springs ID # 2817 & 2895

The Palms at Park Villa is an exquisite, newly built luxury villa in heart of historic Palm Springs. Situated within minutes of downtown and numerous golf courses, and an easy drive from the Coachella Festival Grounds, the villa offers spectacular alfresco amenities, exquisitely designed interiors, and five fabulous bedrooms sleeping ten guests. Over 10,000 square feet of luxurious spaces creates an enchanting environment for family reunions, groups of friends, and destination wedding guests seeking refinement and comfort in this Southern California oasis.

Surrounded by lush gardens and palms, and enjoying lovely views of the surrounding Sonoran Desert hills, the villa's outdoor terrace is perfect for savoring the region's exquisite light and air. Enjoy mornings floating in the swimming pool and relaxing on semi-submerged loungers and armchairs. Cook a barbeque lunch and relish it alfresco at the poolside table. On cool desert nights, sip champagne in the hot tub or cuddle up around the fire pit under the stars. Lovely lighting casts a dreamy glow on nighttime gatherings after a wonderful concert or evening on the town.

Ample sliding glass doors open from the pool terrace to the interior kitchen and dining area, creating an expansive space for dinner and cocktail parties. Enjoy a delicious bottle of wine in the fabulous living room with fireplace, large TV, and lovely furnishings. Prepare dinner in the fully equipped kitchen with twin island breakfast bars, and gather around the beautiful dining table.

The villa features five bedrooms: a master with king bed and four guest suites with queen beds. All of the rooms have deluxe ensuite bathrooms and open directly to the terrace or the furnished patio. The superb master suite is the most spacious of them all, and has a stand-alone tub in its bathroom.

The Palms at Park Villa provides lovely balance of privacy and convenience in one of the finest neighborhoods in Palm Springs. You're just five minutes from the world-class art, cultural attractions, dining of the city's downtown area, while Golfers are within minutes of Mesquite, Indian Canyons, and Escena. Indio and the Coachella Festival Grounds are about twenty-three miles away. The villa includes a private garage as well as an electric vehicle charging station.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Kick back in your hot tub overlooking Lake Austin at this waterfront home northwest of downtown. Nestled on more than an acre of private estate, the family-friendly house features sprawling outdoor living areas leading down to the shore, as well as superbly equipped interiors for dining, downtime, and entertaining. Grill up a Texas-sized feast in the outdoor kitchen and relish it alfresco. Embark along the river from your private dock or drive 15 miles into Austin’s heart.

The 6,400-square-foot villa gives a contemporary take on the Spanish Colonial style, with its cream-white facade, rich wood ceiling beams, and arcaded veranda. The terrace and yard give you everything you need to relax and enjoy the outdoors, from the fully equipped kitchen to the ample lawn to the generous pool under towering trees. Indoors, a second gourmet kitchen serves multiple living and dining areas, and Old Texas survives in the lounge with fireplace, bar, and nearby piano. Business travelers will appreciate the roomy and light-filled office suite, while the media room with kitchenette is perfect for late-night gatherings.

Situated at a tranquil remove from Austin’s urban bustle, the villa is still within easy reach of the Capitol, the Convention Center, and the city’s finest nightlife spots. Head to Zilker Metropolitan Park for an SXSW show or a dip in Barton Springs, and grab your clubs for a round at Barton Creek Coore & Crenshaw Golf Course.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Easily one of Deer Valley’s most luxurious vacation homes, Sky Ridge Retreat offer an endless supply of amenities, a gorgeous atmosphere, and ample space for your large group. With six amazing bedrooms, Sky Ridge has accommodations for twenty-one, making it perfect for a larger scale family event or corporate retreat. At Sky Ridge, Deer Valley ski access is just steps from the front door and the mountain views are endless.

From the massive stone fireplace of the great room, to the checkered floor of the movie theatre’s concession, Sky Ridge is gorgeous and dynamic. Stone, wood, and plenty of mountain framing windows set a luxurious alpine tone throughout the estate. Plush designer furniture and spacious rooms, lit by bright chandeliers, create a warm and inviting atmosphere. In a vacation home with accommodations for twenty-one, space is important. Sky Ridge does a great job of making sure each common space has enough room for the whole group, as does the kitchen, which is essentially two high-end kitchens in one.

On the multi-level terrace, views of Jordanelle Lake and the ski slopes can be seen from outdoor living spaces as well as the twenty-person hot tub. After you’ve warmed up in the hot tub, head back inside and settle in for a movie night in the home theatre, complete with a fifties style concession area. Or, if you’ve still got some energy after a long day on the slopes, challenge a friend to a game of billiards, ping pong, or foosball.

Sky Ridge’s first six bedrooms feature either a king or queen sized bed and en-suite bathrooms. The final bedroom has three sets of bunk beds and an en-suite, making it great for kids and extra guests.

Aside from the world-class skiing of Deer Valley, Park City is home to plenty of great parks, golf courses, shops, and restaurants. Check the local concert listings as well because this quaint ski town also boasts a pretty vibrant nightlife.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Backyard barbeques, midnight swims, and long soaks in the hot tub are on the menu at this secluded contemporary home in Huntington Beach. Flow through the massive wall-length opening to the private backyard and watch as guests mingle without barriers, utilizing the entire villa. When it gets late, take the party to one of the many nightclubs lining Huntington State Beach, just a few minutes away.

Open-concept/open-air design is a huge point of pride for Pine Street. Make yourself a snack in the kitchen while the group’s mixologist sorts drink at the wet bar, and the kids splash around in the pool, all in direct sightlines of each other. Elements like the marble fireplace, designer furnishings, and accent walls are used to break-up the spaces without hindering the social flow.

On a quiet night in, the widescreen and plush sofas in the living room are ready to host a family movie night, and the balcony in the master is a great spot to catch up on some reading. On not-so-quiet evenings, gather the gang around the fire pit and reminisce about old times or turn on the outdoor TV and watch the big game while you enjoy the weather of the west coast.

Kick off your shoes and hit the shores of Huntington Beach, where you’ll find over 42-miles of sandy coast to explore. If you head south, Newport Beach and Balboa Pier are perfect for a date night. After a romantic dinner, take a ride on the Ferris wheel, spend some change in the arcade, and be a kid again, but without the kids. The next day, take the family to Disneyland or Califonia Adventure.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Grand Chateau, located at the base of Heavenly Mountain Ski Resort, is the perfect setting for your large group vacation in South Tahoe. This luxurious ski lodge has incredibly spacious interiors. With multiple lounge areas, a large games room with a wet bar, and a movie theatre, Grand Chateau vast estate is sure to satisfy your whole group. And, with golf, skiing, beach, and city life all within a few minutes drive, you’re sure to fall in love with Lake Tahoe any time of the year.

The warmth and natural beauty of exposed wood are on display in this welcoming mountain home. Two-story vaulted ceilings make Grand Chateau’s spacious living room feel even bigger. And, plush designer furniture, a roaring gas fireplace, and a wide screen television make this living room the perfect place to relax after an exciting day on the mountain.

Outside, the excitement continues with features like a bocce court, fire pit, and hot tub. If you love barbecue, the built-in on the terrace’s wet bar is the perfect setting for an alfresco lunch while you enjoy the scenic mountain view. Back inside, bonus features like the indoor pool and sauna show why Grand Chateau is one of the most amenity-filled rentals in the area.

After a long day on the slopes, at the beach, or on the golf course, head into town and enjoy some of South Tahoe’s celebrated nightlife. With restaurants and bars ranging from fine dining to local cafes, and dance clubs to dive bars, South Tahoe surely has establishments to fit whatever you have in mind for your night on the town. Travel a little further, and you’ll find more world-class skiing at Northstar California Resort and Squaw Valley. If you’re feeling lucky, Reno is just under an hour from Grand Chateau. And, for a day on the beach, visit Lakeside Beach, with its sandy shores, beachfront restaurant, and safe family swimming.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

PERMIT #7589

listing.listing_description:
Gandhara, an 11,000 square foot home in the gated Deer Crest community, is one of our most unique Utah vacation rentals. Set on the slopes of Deer Valley Resort, this distinct ski-in/ski-out home was designed by renowned architect Michael Upwall. Gandhara, named for an ancient kingdom in the foothills of Hindu Kush, maintains a distinct, colorful personality.

Amenities include a private salt-water hot tub, exercise room and elevator for your enjoyment. The inviting outdoor fire pit with pristine views of the slopes is a perfect meeting place for après ski for you and your guests. Take the spiral staircase to the indoor bar and pool table which are adjacent to the home theatre with stadium seating. Private concierge and daily housekeeping ensure a comfortable stay.

Whimsical paintings fill the home, including works by Banksy and Yue Minjun. The floor-to-ceiling stone fireplace is the centerpiece in the living area. The kitchen is accented by stone, granite and wood with ample seating and modern appliances. The catwalk above the kitchen and living area provide an open-air feel to this expansive 11,000 square foot villa. The wood-lined windows provide a gateway to the spectacular mountain views.

This exquisite ski lodge sleeps up to 14 guests in six well-appointed en-suite bedrooms. The villa is equipped with two master suites, each with king size beds and their own private televisions. Kids will love the bunkroom with two double / twin beds and their own television. All bedrooms except the kids’ room have fireplaces.

Situated on the slopes of Deer Valley Resort, this ski-in / ski-out property connects to the Blue Run of Jordanelle where you can ski to the nearest Gondola.

Note: Certain amenities may vary during the summer season. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Colorado’s famous powder is at your doorstep at Snowline Ridge 307. Set on the Stampede run at Steamboat Ski Resort, this ground-floor Steamboat Springs vacation rental gives you direct access to the slopes. Luxury amenities at the Edgemont community, snug yet stylish interiors and four bedrooms give the villa an irresistible combination of convenience and charm.

Guests of the Edgemont complex are invited to use the shared heated outdoor pool and hot tub during their holidays. If you can’t get enough of the fresh mountain air, heat up the barbecue on the villa’s private deck for dinner or gather around the al-fresco fireplace to roast marshmallows. Inside, leave your gear in the villa’s dedicated ski storage area and cozy up to the fireplace and flat-screen television with a glass from the wine cooler.

Rich earth tones, stone and wood textures and an open-plan great room give the interiors of Snowline Ridge 307 a modern feel that’s rooted in traditional mountain style. There’s plenty of room to gather the whole family on the sofas in the sitting area, around the live-edge dining table or on the bar-height benches at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.

The property has three bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms: a master suite with a king bed and fireplace that opens to its own deck, a second bedroom with a king bed, and a bedroom with a queen bed, mountain views and deck access. The fourth bedroom has bunk beds, opens to the deck and shares a hall bathroom.

While you could spend your stay on the ski trails right outside, it’s worth exploring the Steamboat Springs area. Take the complimentary seasonal shuttle to discover the shopping and dining options in the close-by mountain village. Don’t miss the area’s hot springs, from the family-friendly Old Town to the relive-your-honeymoon pools at Strawberry Park. The snow may melt in the summer, but the town heats up with enough golf, kayaking, rafting, fishing, hiking and more to fill any visitor’s schedule.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Carve the fresh powder of Telluride Ski Resort and return to soothing soaks in your outdoor hot tub and warm evenings by the fire. Located within the Tristant development at Mountain Village, this family-friendly townhome features generous living and dining areas, a gourmet kitchen, gorgeous views, and easy access to Village Bypass trail. Walk to nightlife in Mountain Village Core and ride the gondola into Telluride Town. 

Wood-beamed walls and a massive stone hearth evoke the vintage charms of this Rocky Mountain mining down, while contemporary fixtures ensure total comfort. Glass French doors open to an expansive deck with views of the San Sophia ridge, a perfect spot for barbeque grilling. The open kitchen with Viking and Cuisinart appliances forms the fulcrum of the home, serving a breakfast bar and a light-filled dining niche.

The 3-story home features 2 king suites on the top floor with lofted guest beds, along with a separate bunk room. The bottom floor features 2 more guest rooms, a TV room, a laundry room, and doors to the patio with hot tub.

Tristant offers one of the finest locations in Mountain Village, with access to the slopes via Village Bypass run or the nearby funicular. Biking and hiking trails abound for summertime adventures, and it’s an easy trip into Telluride Town for its famous festivals celebrating film, jazz, bluegrass, cuisine, and more. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This stylish villa offers tasteful interiors, spacious pool, and a fine view of the signature Jack Nicklaus golf course at Reunion. Easy catering for big groups is part of this home’s appeal, with a double garage, huge dining table, premium barbecue, and 8 bedrooms - including playfully-themed rooms for kids. Disney World, Universal Studios, Reunion’s spa facilities and Orlando are all nearby. 

Kids will love starting the day at this home in their own unique bedrooms, with the home’s games room providing a worthy distraction as adult guests snooze in their own plush bedrooms. The home’s fully-equipped kitchen makes breakfast time an easy affair, with groups able to easily gather around the big table and plan outings. Guests of all ages will love a quick game of air hockey or foosball, with additional arcade and video games rounding out the extensive entertainment options. The home’s sun terrace is a great place to finish off a packed day with a well-deserved cool drink, while the home’s home theater offers diverse movie nights for the entire group.

A drive from this home to the entrance to Disney World takes just a few minutes, ensuring guests can experience a full day of magical parades, fun rides and memorable experiences. The similarly famous Universal Studios are also just a short journey, while the spas, renowned restaurants and PGA golf course of Reunion are just moments from the home, with airboat and kayak outings to nearby wetlands and flooded forests offer a pleasant change of pace. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The golf courses, festivals, and charming desert cities await your large group, and this pair of Spanish colonial villas are the perfect home base. Spend your afternoons lounging by the pool or organize a beach volleyball tournament. At night, gather around the fire pit and see who can toast the perfect golden-brown marshmallow. In the morning, hit the links bright and early in Palm Springs.

Sharing a spacious backyard, these 2 airy desert houses were made for exciting group getaways. Inside, open concept living/dining areas, decorated eye-catching contemporary furnishings, create a festive social setting with more than enough space for the whole group to gather as one. With 2 fully equipped kitchens and barbecues, mealtime is a breeze, and the alfresco set offers plenty of space to mingle while you eat.

After dinner, throw the big game on satellite television and grab a beer from the bar by the pool table. When it cools off at night, hop into the hot tub for a rejuvenating soak or stretch out by the living room’s gas fireplace. To make life even more comfortable, the Strut Oasis houses have a lengthy list of add-ons available during your stay, including private chef services, spa treatment, and more.

If you’re in town for festival season, the Coachella grounds are located five minutes from Strut Oasis. If it’s golf you’re after; the desert cities are home to over 100 incredible courses, including PGA West, a course designed to be the sequel to TPC Sawgrass. In downtown Indio, you’ll find plenty of delicious Mexican cuisine, vibrant nightlife, and shopping that ranges from desert antiques to high-end fashion.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

City ID # 19-00023265 & 20-00023266

listing.listing_description:
Tropical Retreat is a stunning luxury home in Irving Cove, an exclusive community of villas with a private beach and other resort-style amenities, located on the Pacific Coast of Southern California near Laguna Beach. Built in a traditional Balinese style, the villa combines an extraordinary collection of traditional décor with high-end contemporary amenities for relaxation and dining, including an outdoor swimming pool and hot tub, an alfresco dining area and bar, a game room with pool table, and a gourmet kitchen. Five superb bedroom suites with ensuite bathrooms—including a separate guesthouse suite—accommodate families and groups of friends up to ten in size.

The 6,020-square-foot home is perched amid luxuriant gardens and dreamy koi ponds, evoking the ambiance of a tropical oasis. The bi-level terrace of beautiful stone features an elevated spa cascading into the ample pool. A lovely barbecue station beneath a palapa parasol serves a poolside table for eight. The villa’s upper balconies offer quiet retreats with views of the Pacific Ocean and Santa Catalina Islands.

Glass doors open from the pool terrace to the main interior living areas, infusing the home with natural light and gentle breezes. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliance and generous prep space, and serves a comfortable dining area below. There are multiple high-end TVs throughout the home, including a superb cinema with a large screen and high-end sound system. The upstairs office is spacious and light-filled, and opens to a balcony with inspiring views. Central air conditioning and heating ensure comfort at all times.

The master suite features a sumptuous king bed, large TV, and glass doors opening to a spacious balcony, while its ensuite bathroom includes a walk-in shower and freestanding tub. Each of the guest suites includes a queen bed, TV, and ensuite bathroom, and two open to balconies.

Irving Cove offers tennis and volleyball courts and a private beach, among other amenities, all within minutes of the villa's door. You're also within easy driving distance of several renowned public beaches, and the outstanding shopping and dining of Newport Beach town. Pelican Hill Golf Club is just over three miles away, and Disney Land is a comfortable 26-mile drive.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Discover the luxury side of Ski Town USA at Piney Mountain. Part of the exceptional One Steamboat Place resort in Steamboat Springs, this well-appointed private residence offers the comfort and flexibility of a home in a first-class setting. Take advantage of the resort amenities, seasonal shuttle and ski-in, ski-out location for an exceptional winter holiday in Colorado.

Guests of Piney Mountain are invited to use the shared pool, hot tubs, fitness center, wine cellar and tasting room at One Steamboat Place. Let the kids make friends in the resort’s Little Tykes room while the grown-ups book a treatment at the renowned spa, or gather as a family in the games room or lounges. If you’d prefer to entertain in private, the villa has its own deck with a gas grill and a spacious great room overlooking the pool area and valley.

Rich colors, natural textures and luxe fabrics define the One Steamboat Place look, and the interiors of Piney Mountain are no exception. Cozy up to the gas fireplace and television in one of the leather armchairs in the living room, or sit down for a special occasion at chairs with beautiful nailhead details in the adjacent dining area. Not only is the open-plan kitchen fully equipped, it features high-end appliances and cheerful, colorful cabinets.

This Steamboat Springs vacation rental can accommodate up to ten guests in four comfortable bedrooms. There are two with king beds and en-suite bathrooms perfect for couples, and two with double beds, bunk beds and shared bathrooms where kids will want to stay.

Not only does Steamboat Springs have some of the best skiing in the country, it also has a lively downtown and hot springs you can still visit. During the winter, put on your skis for the 1-minute trip to the Steamboat gondola at Steamboat Ski Resort; in the summer, pack your clubs for the short drive to the nearest golf course. Old Town Steamboat Springs, 3 miles away, offer several pools and even slides, while Strawberry Park Hot Springs, 10 miles away, are great for a honeymoon-style soak and stargazing amid the natural rock formations.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Set off for mountain adventures year-round from Snowy Point Chalet. Whether it’s summer or winter, this Breckenridge vacation rental puts you close to some of the best hiking and skiing in Colorado, plus shopping and dining in town. The villa’s 3,500 square feet and four bedrooms mean you can invite up to ten friends or a group of extended family.

If you’re visiting during the summer, enjoy the fresh mountain air from a deck with a barbecue, sound system and al-fresco dining for four, or a terrace with an outdoor hot tub. If you’re here to ski, unwind after a day on the slopes in the media room, around the wet bar or at the foosball table. Other amenities range from cable TV and Wi-Fi to laundry facilities.

The heart of this luxury chalet is a classic mountain-lodge-style great room with vaulted ceilings, wood beams, floor-to-ceiling windows and a massive stone fireplace. Stretch out on a pair of leather sofas in front of the hearth (and TV), relive the day’s adventures over a snack at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen or plan the next ones around the dining table.

Snowy Point Chalet has two bedrooms with king beds and private en-suite bathrooms, including a honeymoon-suite-inspired master bedroom with a jetted tub, and one bedroom with a king bed and shared bathroom. The fourth bedroom has a twin-over queen bunk bed plus a twin trundle bed and an en-suite bathroom.

During the summer, you can set off on hiking trails from your own backyard or even head into town, a 10-minute walk downhill. During the winter, it’s a short walk to the 4 O’Clock ski run and a 5-minute drive into the town of Breckenridge. No matter when your holiday, you’re close to outdoor activities, spectacular scenery, and convenient shopping and dining.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
A consistent host of international ski competitions, it’s no wonder so many Olympic skiers call Steamboat Springs home. The Elk Mountain residence at One Steamboat place offers an amazing view of the entire valley, and it’s located right by the resort's main gondola.

After an exciting day on the slopes, return to Elk Mountain for a relaxing evening with family and friends. With a fully equipped kitchen and a barbeque on the balcony, preparing meals is easy. Formal dining for ten, an open concept living room, and a beautiful fire place create a comfortable environment for the whole family. If you still need a little more excitement, head to the resort’s shared pool and hot tub for a late night dip.

What comes to mind when you picture a classic ski lodge? Probably wood floors, a stone fireplace, comfortable leather furniture, and a warm and cozy atmosphere, right? That’s exactly Elk Mountain’s ambience, and then some. Top of the line stainless steel appliances, bright modern lighting fixtures, and colorful cabinetry give the kitchen an element of style. Elegant décor gives the villa a touch of luxury, while staying true to its rustic roots. And, large windowed doors open to the balcony and the spectacular mountain view.

The décor of the living room continues in to Elk Mountain’s bed and bathrooms. The master has a king sized bed, walk-in closet, fireplace, and an ensuite with a steam shower, bathtub, and dual vanity. The three other bedrooms feature a king, two doubles, and two bunk beds, and all of them have ensuite bathrooms.

Near the resort you’ll find restaurants and shopping in Steamboat Springs Old Town, a charming part of the city to spend an afternoon exploring. Come summer, book a tee time at Rolling Stone Ranch Golf Course, another great way to take in even more of this area’s breathtaking scenery.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Relax into beautiful mountain views and custom finishes at Black Bear Chalet. This luxury Steamboat Springs vacation rental is well appointed―and perfectly positioned, with the nearest ski lift a short walk or drive away. Book the four suite-style bedrooms for a family ski holiday or getaway with friends, or reserve the property with its sister chalet to host a reunion or celebrate a special occasion.

Black Bear Chalet features spacious living areas that make entertaining a snap. Besides the open-plan great room, there’s a lower-level rec room with a large-screen television, surround sound, video-game system and a pool table. The villa even has you covered in warm weather, with a private deck with a barbecue, al-fresco dining area and hot tub. And from a dedicated ski storage area with boot dryers to an elevator ready to whisk guests to every level of the home, the practical details have been taken care of as well.

You’ll feel warm and welcome in the villa’s cozy great room, surrounded by earth tones and soft textures. A seat in the coffee-colored leather sofas in front of the rustic stone fireplace is just what’s needed after a day out in the snow, and there’s room for ten in coordinating wood and leather chairs around the dining table. Whether you’re cooking for a crowd or just having a snack, it’s a pleasure in the fully equipped kitchen, which has custom alder cabinetry, granite countertops and state-of-the-art appliances.

The four bedrooms at Black Bear Chalet can be rearranged to fit your party’s needs. There are three rooms with king beds, which can be separated into two twin beds, and one bedroom with two bunk beds that kids will want to claim as their own. Each of the four bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom and the same thoughtful, snug feel as the common areas.

If you’ll be visiting Colorado for the skiing, you’ll appreciate the 10-minute walk DASH or 1-minute drive in the complimentary shuttle DASH to the Thunderhead express chairlift, or the 5-minute drive to Steamboat Ski Resort. When there’s more green than white on the ground, it only makes sense to head to the fairways at Rollingstone Ranch Golf Club, just under 3 miles from the villa. Don’t miss the chance to visit the kid-friendly pools and slides at Steamboat Springs Old Town, or the honeymoon-worthy hot springs amid natural rock formations at Strawberry Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This elegant slope-side mountain home rests within the exclusive Empire Pass area of Deer Valley Resort, offering seclusion and convenience with exceptional ski access and gorgeous views. Only minutes from shopping, fine dining and lively nightlife on Main Street Park City, Paintbrush Home is the perfect choice for summer hiking or your next Utah ski vacation. Up to 12 guests can be comfortably accommodated in 5 luxurious bedrooms and children are welcome. 

Your personal concierge will welcome you to your villa and conduct a tour of its facilities. A generous living room sits at the heart of this inviting mountain home, overlooking the majestic peaks through tall cathedral-like windows. The beautifully equipped family kitchen makes meal preparation effortless, and for an extra cost you can hire a private chef and catering services. If you really want to enjoy yourselves, grocery delivery, child care and wine pairings can also be arranged for a fee.

Honeyed wooden floors, vaulted ceilings soft rugs and plush, deeply cushioned sofas lend this villa an air of homely luxury. Start your morning with a full breakfast at the family dining table or breakfast bar to prepare you for the slopes. At the end of a long day, settle in front of a crackling wood fire with a glass of mulled wine and recount your skiing adventures or soak your tired muscles in the outdoor hot tub under a canopy of stars.

All that fresh mountain air is bound to make you sleepy and you can look forward to a comfortable night’s sleep in a restful bedroom. Thick drapes curtain the large windows and entertainment is provided in the form of flat screen televisions. All bedrooms, including the children’s bunk room, are served by luxurious en-suite bathrooms with deep bathtubs, and Bedroom Two benefits from a jetted tub and shower.

When you’re not carving out your niche on the slopes, check out heli-ski and Snowcat tours. Snowmobiling and sleigh rides can also be organized and we can charter a jet or helicopter on your behalf if you want to travel further afield. Ride the official bobsled track of the 2002 Olympics or take advantage of the Dial a Ride service to go anywhere in the Park City area.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
European charm comes to Colorado at the gorgeous Cypress Mountain Chalet. Its cozy interiors, luxury amenities and five bedrooms welcome up to fifteen guests in comfort. A location in the exclusive Highlands of Breckenridge area puts you a 10-minute drive or less from skiing, plus shopping and dining in downtown Breckenridge.

The chalet features private outdoor living areas with a hot tub, al-fresco dining for eight and a barbecue. Despite its Old World–inspired architecture, it also boasts state-of-the-art entertainment, with a television, Xbox 360, sound system and Wi-Fi. For those who prefer to unwind the traditional way, there’s a gas fireplace in the media room and a wet bar, too.

Wood paneling and stone walls make this vacation rental feel like it’s been transplanted from Switzerland, but the spacious open-concept layout is all New World. Settle in with family and friends under the double-height ceiling in the great room, or gather in one of the two dining areas adjoining the fully equipped kitchen: a dining table and a breakfast nook.

Cypress Mountain Chalet has one master bedroom with a king bed and jetted tub, one bedroom with a queen bed, and one bedroom with your choice of two twin beds or a double bed; these three bedrooms all have en-suite bathrooms. The other two bedrooms have a twin bunk bed plus a queen bed, and two twin bunk beds, respectively, and shared bathroom access.

While on holiday at this villa, you’ll be just a 10-minute drive from skiing on Peak 8 at Breckenridge, as well as shopping and dining in downtown Breckenridge. Bring the family for a day out on cross-country skis or snowshoes at the Breckenridge Nordic Center, 5 minutes away by car, or plan a honeymoon-worthy dinner in town for a grown-ups’ evening out.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

feature.p: Bedroom 1 - Cypress Wood Master Suite: King size bed, En-suite bathroom with shower and jetted bathtub, Walk-in closet, Television

listing.listing_description:
Please note that this home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

Settle in by the fireplace after a long day on the slopes of Park City Mountain at this ski-in/ski-out condo in Canyons Village. Gaze out the window off the elevated balcony, and tell tales of an exciting day while you take in the mountain view. Reward yourself with a soothing dip in the private hot tub. Then, walk down to Canyons Village for a farm-to-table dinner at the local steakhouse.

It’s got the dark woods, granite countertops, plush furniture, and mountain views of a traditional ski lodge, but Apex Plaza puts a fresh, modern spin on the style. Gather in the open-concept living room for a drink at the kitchen’s bar while the chef in your group prepares dinner. Better yet, pick up something fresh from a local market and do some grilling on the terrace. After dinner, hang out in the games room or burn off some calories in the home gym. If the weather permits, swim a few laps in the shared pool.

Make sure to check the local listings if you’re a fan of live music. Park City has a bustling concert schedule all-year-round. If you’re in the mood to shop, do some antiquing, or check out the latest ski gear, take a stroll down Historic Main Street. In the warmer months, golf, mountain biking, and rock climbing are great ways to experience Utah’s rugged terrain.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located only a short walk away from the main gondola at One Steamboat Place, this luxury rental is the perfect home base for your ski vacation. Due in part to its absolutely breathtaking mountain landscape and charming downtown resort amenities, Steamboat Springs has been a consistent host of international competition and is home to many Olympic skiers.

Just like a classic ski lodge, this luxury condo has natural hardwood flooring, a grand stone fireplace, and a large great room. Now combine that rustic charm with high end extravagance and you’ve got Deer Mountain. Beautiful modern lighting fixtures, top of the line stainless steel appliances, designer furniture, and elegant décor add a touch of sophistication to the traditional chalet ambience.

With accommodations for eight, formal dining for ten, and a large open concept living room, there is plenty of space for the whole family to relax after a long day on the slopes. A fully equipped kitchen and a barbeque on the balcony make meal time a breeze. After dinner, lounge in the living room by the fireplace and enjoy the villa’s television and DVD player.

Deer Mountain’s master bedroom features a king sized bed and ensuite bathroom with steam shower, bathtub, and dual vanity. The other three bedrooms have king, queen, and two double beds, and all but one has an ensuite. The bedrooms décor matches the living room, warm, cozy, and comfortable. The bathrooms have marble counters and beautiful modern fixtures.

If you feel like shopping, dining out, or seeing some local sights, Steamboat Springs old Town is a charming area to spend an afternoon. Strawberry Park Natural Hot Springs and Rolling Stone Ranch Golf Course are close by as well, if you’re in the mood to explore more of the area’s natural attractions.

listing.listing_description:
A luxury suite within One Steamboat Place gives you exclusive privacy and world-class mountain lodge amenities just a minute's walk from Steamboat Gondola. Among the vacation rentals here, the three-bedroom Zen Mountain suite stands out for its stunning, Asian-inflected décor. It's ideal for families and friends seeking exquisite tranquility during a Rocky Mountain getaway.

The luminous, open-plan living area features a lounge of supple leather furnishings surrounding the stone hearth. Here, you'll relax together after an adventurous day on the slopes, warming your feat by the wood-burning fireplace and watching your favorite movies on the mounted flat screen television. In the evening, you'll prepare hearty meals in the fully equipped kitchen, and share them at the carved-wood dining table for ten. Outside the living lounge, your private deck overlooks Steamboat and includes a Viking gas grill for barbeques in the alpine air. The suite also features a nicely sized office suite and high-speed WiFi.

The bedrooms at Zen Mountain are beautiful sanctuaries. The master bedroom features a gorgeous wall of birch saplings behind the bed's headboard, bringing the spirit of the forest into your dreams. A deliciously soft leather armchair beside a nightstand of petrified wood faces the fireplace, and the ensuite bathroom includes stand-alone steam shower and jetted bathtub. The second room has a king bed and twin bunk beds with trundle, and an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower and bathtub; while the third bedroom has a queen bed and ensuite bathroom with shower/tub combo.

One Steamboat Place offers you the ideal location for relishing these world-class slopes, with the Steamboat Gondola literally steps from the front entrance. When you return in the evening, you'll enjoy access to the complex's world-class lodge amenities, including the outdoor heated swimming pool and hot tub, the classic Great Room, and the Little Tykes room for kids.

The many delights of Steamboat and its environs are at your fingertips. Steamboat Springs Old Town and City Market are just a short drive away, as is Rolling Stone Ranch Golf Course. And for a truly restorative soak in the heart of nature, visit Strawberry Natural Hot Springs, just ten miles away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Grill up some Austin-style barbecue as the kids play on the trampoline at this modern home in West Lake Hills. Ideal for private fun between adventures on the town, the house includes a gourmet kitchen and spacious living and dining areas both inside and out. But don't let the tranquil atmosphere fool you: it's just a mile to Barton Springs Pool and the concerts at Zilker Park, and only 4 miles to Downtown Austin.

The house is nestled amid lush greenery framing a generous portion of Texas sky. Enjoy playful afternoons at the basketball hoop or in the grassy yard, or watch the big game on the outdoor TV. Spark the grill in the evening and gather-for lantern-lit dinners around the table for 8.

The open-concept interior offers a cool retreat from the summer sun, with stylish yet welcoming furniture and a harmonious palette of blue and orange, mahogany and gold. Watch a favorite show in the lounge, uncork a bottle of wine by the fire, and channel the world-class foodie spirit of Austin in the fully equipped kitchen. Find focus in the office space or retreat into the media room for a nightcap and movie.

Perfect for a family or group of friends, the house features a master suite with ensuite bathroom (including a soaking tub), as well as an adult-friendly guest suite with queen bed and ensuite bathroom. The other two guestrooms share a Jack & Jill bathroom between them; each has a queen bed and kid-friendly décor.

This West Lake Hills location offers convenient access to the heart of Austin and some of the most beautiful areas of Texas Hill Country. Drive about a mile for a dip in Barton Springs Pool or a show at Zilker Metropolitan Park—one of the prime venues for SXSW and Austin City Limits. Play the fairways of Lions Municipal Golf Course and discover the natural beauty of McKinney Falls State Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Look out over the whole Palm Springs Valley from Cliffside Estate. Perched high above the city and nestled into the rocks of the hillside, this incredible Desert Cities vacation rental commands views of the palm-dotted landscape from sleek, modern rooms. Despite the private setting, however, this luxury property is only a short drive from some of the area’s best golf, plus must-see sights downtown.

Revel in the California sunshine from a tucked-away terrace featuring a heated pool, hot tub, water feature and plenty of loungers. In the evenings, heat up the barbecue for dinner at the al-fresco table, or entertain inside with the help of the wet bar, TV, sound system and Wi-Fi. The villa is air conditioned for the warmest days and has a fireplace to ward off the cool of desert nights.

Cliffside Estate has been featured in several architectural magazines, and it’s easy to see why. The heart of the home is an open-concept living and dining area with polished floors, whitewashed brick walls and, best of all, glass walls framing views of the valley. Three steps lead up to a fully equipped kitchen with a convenient breakfast bar.

The villa has two bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms: one master suite with a king bed and a second bedroom with a queen bed. The other two bedrooms have a queen bed and two twin beds, respectively, and share a bathroom that’s accessible from both rooms. The four bedrooms can accommodate up to eight friends or family members on holiday together.

This modern retreat is less than a 10-mile drive from some of the area’s best shopping, dining and more. Tee off at one of several nearby golf courses, give yourself a honeymoon from the everyday at a spa or soak in culture at the Palm Springs Art Museum.

Palm Springs City ID # 7169

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
